languages.text: Барельеф аквилы на двери натерт до блеска — его или специально полируют, или часто гладят "на удачу", как заведено у простолюдинов.
The carved Aquila on the door has been polished to a shine — either through special cleaning or as a result of frequent rubbing for good luck, as is the practice among common people.
languages.original_text: Барельеф аквилы на двери натерт до блеска — его или специально полируют, или часто гладят "на удачу", как заведено у простолюдинов.

traits.locale_text: The carved Aquila on the door has been polished to a shine — either through special cleaning or as a result of frequent rubbing for good luck, as is the practice among common people.
The carved Aquila on the door has been polished to a shine — either through special cleaning or as a result of frequent rubbing for good luck, as is the practice among common people.
The carved Aquila on the door has been polished to a shine — either through special cleaning or as a result of frequent rubbing for good luck, as is the practice among common people.
The carved Aquila on the door has been polished to a shine — either through special cleaning or as a result of frequent rubbing for good luck, as is the practice among common people.

languages.text: 门上雕刻的双头鹰印记被擦拭得闪闪发光。要么是进行过特别的清洁，要么是经常有人抚摸这个印记，祈求好运。普通船员常常会做这种事情。
languages.original_text: The carved Aquila on the door has been polished to a shine — either through special cleaning or as a result of frequent rubbing for good luck, as is the practice among common people.

traits.locale_text: 门上雕刻的双头鹰印记被擦拭得闪闪发光。要么是进行过特别的清洁，要么是经常有人抚摸这个印记，祈求好运。普通船员尝尝会做这种事情。

languages.text: El Aquila tallada en la puerta está tan pulida que brilla. O están cuidando especialmente de ella o la frotan para que les dé suerte, una práctica común entre la gente corriente.
languages.original_text: The carved Aquila on the door has been polished to a shine — either through special cleaning or as a result of frequent rubbing for good luck, as is the practice among common people.

traits.locale_text: El Aquila tallada en la puerta está tan pulida que brilla. O están cuidando especialmente de ella o la frotan para que les dé suerte, una práctica común entre la gente corriente.

languages.text: 扉に彫られたアクィラはピカピカに磨かれている。特別なクリーニングを施したか、あるいは庶民の習慣として、縁起を担いで頻繁に擦った結果であろう。
languages.original_text: The carved Aquila on the door has been polished to a shine — either through special cleaning or as a result of frequent rubbing for good luck, as is the practice among common people.

traits.locale_text: 扉に彫られたアクィラはピカピカに磨かれている。特別なクリーニングを施したか、あるいは庶民の習慣として、縁起を担いで頻繁に擦った結果であろう。

languages.text: Der geschnitzte Aquila auf der Tür ist so glattpoliert, dass er geradezu blitzt — entweder durch eine spezielle Reinigung oder weil er so häufig als Glücksbringer gerieben wurde, wie einfache Leute es gern tun.
languages.original_text: The carved Aquila on the door has been polished to a shine — either through special cleaning or as a result of frequent rubbing for good luck, as is the practice among common people.

traits.locale_text: Der geschnitzte Aquila auf der Tür ist so glattpoliert, dass er geradezu blitzt — entweder durch eine spezielle Reinigung oder weil er so häufig als Glücksbringer gerieben wurde, wie einfache Leute es gern tun.

languages.text: Poli au fil des années, l'Aquila gravé sur la porte brille de tous ses feux, que ce soit le résultat d'un nettoyage méticuleux ou à force d'être frotté en guise de porte-bonheur, une pratique courante parmi les petites gens.
languages.original_text: The carved Aquila on the door has been polished to a shine — either through special cleaning or as a result of frequent rubbing for good luck, as is the practice among common people.

traits.locale_text: Poli au fil des années, l'Aquila gravé sur la porte brille de tous ses feux, que ce soit le résultat d'un nettoyage méticuleux ou à force d'être frotté en guise de porte-bonheur, une pratique courante parmi les petites gens.

languages.text: Kapıya oyulmuş Çift Başlı Kartal, cilalanmışçasına parlıyor. Sebebi, özel temizlik prosedürleri ya da avamın gelenek gereği şans için sıkça ovması olabilir.
languages.original_text: The carved Aquila on the door has been polished to a shine — either through special cleaning or as a result of frequent rubbing for good luck, as is the practice among common people.

traits.locale_text: Kapıya oyulmuş Çift Başlı Kartal, cilalanmışçasına parlıyor. Sebebi, özel temizlik prosedürleri ya da avamın gelenek gereği şans için sıkça ovması olabilir.
